WorkItem.ClosedComment: This feature is now added and submitted to TFS. Will be part of next release.
WorkItem.Description:
I can't see an easy way to reorder Elements and Attributes.  The xsd that is generated causes all elements to be in sequence, which in my case is not desired.  I feel there should be a way manually re-order elements and attributes, or have a way to set how the elements appear in xsd (ie sequence, choice, all).  
Â 
Thanks

Comments.Message: This would be a nice feature. I will look into it.
FYI: The workaround I currently use for reordering is to manually edit the CSD file. This is the way to go until this feature can be added.
